title: Sparkling Solitaire Studs - Kanupapa Gundlu
materials: Round Brilliant Cut Moissanite stones (Excellent Cut
Stainless Steel Posts with Butterfly Backs
features: Classic solitaire design with a secure six-prong setting showcasing the brilliance of the Moissanite stones. Elevated basket design allows for maximum light reflection. Modern and elegant studs suitable for daily wear. The stainless steel posts are hypoallergenic and comfortable.
occasions: anniversaries. Suitable for both modern and traditional attire. Can be paired with Pattu Sarees
description: These solitaire studs offer the classic elegance of diamond studs at an accessible price point. The Moissanite stones provide exceptional brilliance and fire, rivaling that of diamonds, making them a stunning and sustainable choice. Durable 18K gold setting ensures longevity. A timeless piece that will never go out of style.
